step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, maintaining a relaxed posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoiding pulling forward.
Good hold! You maintained the position effectively. Remember to breathe deeply.
Smooth return to the starting position. Ensure your wrists stay aligned throughout the reverse motion.
Second rep starting well. Continue to keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Good effort raising your hands. Aim to keep your elbows a little closer as you move them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head steady and avoid any forward pull.
You held the position well. Remember to maintain an upright head and relaxed shoulders.
Great job completing the exercise! You returned to the start smoothly, maintaining good form.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows closer together when raising your hands and avoid pulling your head forward. Overall, your movements were controlled and effective for promoting lymph movement.
